testcase.name: Verify available products on inventory page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify available products on inventory page Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.464s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.053s Then User should see 6 products listed ... passed in 0.022s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Sort products by different options -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: Sort products by different options -- @1.1 Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.464s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.051s When the user sorts products by 'az' ... passed in 2.088s Then the products should be sorted by 'name ascending' order ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Sort products by different options -- @1.2
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: Sort products by different options -- @1.2 Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.455s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.052s When the user sorts products by 'za' ... passed in 2.086s Then the products should be sorted by 'name descending' order ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Sort products by different options -- @1.3
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: Sort products by different options -- @1.3 Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.474s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.051s When the user sorts products by 'lohi' ... passed in 2.084s Then the products should be sorted by 'price ascending' order ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.system-out:

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Logout from inventory page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Logout from inventory page Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.425s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.050s When user logs out from the application ... passed in 2.102s Then user should be redirected to the login page ... passed in 0.005s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
